ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | elrab.1 | |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x A |
| 3 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x B |
| 4 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ x ps |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4, 1 | #P_elrabf | |- ( A e. { x e. B | ph } <-> ( A e. B /\ ps ) ) |
